title: How is Navratri and other festivals celebrated in pesu?

comments.body: You came here to study or celebrate festivals ?
It's celebrated in university and colleges situated in North India, not here.
Here's a shocker for you, yaha Holi ki chuti nahi milti

then go there lol.   
Nitk is purely residential hence its like that, i think majority of pes kids are locals.
Dude u dumb or smtg.. The comment stated that festivals aren't celebrated in South Indian colleges.. So was my comment correcting his facts..
You would like an old school principal chill

Tbf Holi isn't a major festival here, so it is understandable. Any institution/organisation follows regional holidays. Once you start working, you will also see that different campuses of a company in different parts of the country will have a slightly different set of holidays.
Yeah but it's hard for people to fathom that a festival like Holi isn't celebrated much in south while it is one of the major festivals in north India.
I completely understand. I'm not a South Indian either and I've never gotten to celebrate Holi properly since I grew up in Bangalore.
